page.title: SuperTux
page.section:
Here goes the list of the people behind this project: (as a note, noone earns money by making this game, our only incentivation is the amusement of doing it.)
Project leader
Tobias (Tobgle) Glaesser tobi.web@gmx.de
Original author
Bill Kendrick nbs@sonic.net http://www.newbreedsoftware.com/
Programmers
Tobias (Tobgle) Glaesser tobi.web@gmx.de
Ricardo (Blacksheep) Cruz rick2@aeiou.pt / http://rpmcruz.planetaclix.pt/
Ingo (Grumbel) Ruhnke grumbel@gmx.de / http://pingus.seul.org/~grumbel/
Matthias (MatzeB) Braun matze@braunis.de
Contrib Programming
Ryan Flegel xxdigitalhellxx@hotmail.com / http://digitalhell.cjb.net/~ryan/
Duong-Khang NGUYEN neoneurone@users.sourceforge.net
Graphics
Ingo (Grumbel) Ruhnke grumbel@gmx.de / http://pingus.seul.org/~grumbel/
Christopher A. (Paroneayea) Webber creat0r@lingocomic.com
Level Design
Marek (Wansti) Moeckel wansti@gmx.de
Ingo (Grumbel) Ruhnke grumbel@gmx.de / http://pingus.seul.org/~grumbel/
Music
Marek (Wansti) Moeckel wansti@gmx.de
Mystical
Mortimer Twang
Sounds
Royalty free sound effects from CDROMs and FTP sites
Thanks to
Larry Ewing Creator of Tux, the Linux penguin
SDL and OpenGL For giving such a great gaming experience possible in Linux
We hope you enjoy our work. - SuperTux team
